text: Alan Ashcroft (21 August 1930 â€“ 26 January 2021) was an English rugby union player. He played in the Number 8 position. Ashcroft played club rugby with Waterloo FC and was a member of the British Lions team that toured in 1959. He played for the English national rugby team from 1956 to 1959. Ashcroft died on 26 January 2021, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English rugby union players
title: Alan Ashcroft
